import AxiosService from'./../services/axiosService';import{API_ENDPOINT}from'./../constants/index';import qs from'query-string';// api http://localhost:3000/task/?q:params METHOD : POST
export var getListUser=function getListUser(url){var params=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};var queryParams='';if(Object.keys(params).length>0){queryParams="?".concat(qs.stringify(params));}return AxiosService.get("".concat(API_ENDPOINT,"/").concat(url).concat(queryParams));};// api http://localhost:3000/auths METHOD: POST
export var addUser=function addUser(url,data){return AxiosService.post("".concat(API_ENDPOINT,"/").concat(url),data);};export var loginUser=function loginUser(url,data){return AxiosService.post("".concat(API_ENDPOINT,"/").concat(url),data);};// api http://localhost:3000/task/:id METHOD: PUT// truyen vao url va data
export var updateUser=function updateUser(url,data){return AxiosService.put("".concat(API_ENDPOINT,"/").concat(url),data);};// api http://localhost:3000/task/:id METHOD: DELETE
export var deteleUser=function deteleUser(url,id){return AxiosService.delete("".concat(API_ENDPOINT,"/").concat(url,"/").concat(id));};
